relation: the set of all real numbers extended with four special values -0 (negative zero), +INF (positive infinity), -INF (negative infinity), and NaN (not-a-number)
the set of all real numbers
the set of all rational numbers

the four special values -0, +INF, -INF, and NaN, plus the set of all real numbers of the form m × 2e where m is an integer whose absolute value is less than 253 and e is an integer between -1075 and 970, inclusive

the four special values -0, +INF, -INF, and NaN, plus the set of all real numbers of the form m × 2e where m is an integer whose absolute value is less than 224 and e is an integer between -149 and 104, inclusive
the set of all real numbers of the form i × 10-n where i is an integer and n is a nonnegative integer
the set of all nonnegative integers
the set of all negative integers plus (positive) zero
the set of all positive integers
the set of all negative integers
the set of all integers between -9223372036854775808 and 9223372036854775807, inclusive
the set of all integers between -2147483648 and 2147483647, inclusive
the set of all integers between -32768 and 32767, inclusive
the set of all integers between -128 and 127, inclusive
the set of all integers between 0 and 18446744073709551615, inclusive
the set of all integers between 0 and 4294967295, inclusive
the set of all integers between 0 and 65535, inclusive
the set of all integers between 0 and 255, inclusive
